attributes.action: make smear tests avaiable to under 25s
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am starting this petition to make smear tests avaiable for women under the age of 25. I have just been diagnised with cancer of the vulva at 23 years of age. I have never had a smear test as I am not in the 25+ age group. I was asked if I had ever had a smear when diagnosed with this maybe this would help people of my age group who are diagnosed with cancers of that particular area.
